wikipedia_page.main: Charles Round (3 September 1885 – 6 October 1945) was an English cricketer. He played two matches for Essex in 1921.

response: Round was a cousin to the Round family of Birch Hall, Essex, members of which included Charles Gray Round, James Round, and Charles Round.Burke's Landed Gentry 1871, vol. II, Burke's Peerage, pg 1195-1196
His son Charles Round played cricket for Essex.

The new house, constructed in 1718, was passed down through the family, as described above. Only those greyed out did not at some time own Hollytrees. It was finally sold by Lt. Col. Charles Round in 1922.
De Zoete was married to Dorothy Courage, with the couple having five children. His brother-in-law, Charles Round, also played first-class cricket.
